blogPost.excerpt: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.
blogPost.body: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.
blogPost.title: Candid Resumes - Unbiased resume screening on autopilot
blogPost.author: Ted Chiang

localize.description: Candid帮助企业简历筛选求职者，找到最优秀的人，过滤掉其他的人。你的简历够不够好，能不能通过简历筛选？通过上传您的简历，在我们的网站上尝试我们的演示，看看您是否通过了测试。
localize.tagline: 无偏见的简历筛选自动驾驶

localize.description: Candid幫助企業簡歷篩選求職者，找到最優秀的人，過濾掉其他的人。你的簡歷夠不夠好，能不能通過簡歷篩選？通過上傳您的簡歷，在我們的網站上嘗試我們的演示，看看您是否通過了測試。
localize.tagline: 無偏見的簡歷篩選自動駕駛

previous.excerpt: Sharing in Clubhouse should be fast, easy, and convenient. That’s where we come in. Pick a hashtag. Share it in your room. Drop a link. Drop a question. Dropit.
previous.title: Dropit for Clubhouse - Sharing in Clubhouse made easy

localize.description: 会所里的分享应该是快速、简单、方便的。这就是我们的优势所在。选择一个标签。在你的房间里分享它。放一个链接。提出一个问题。Dropit.
localize.tagline: 在会所里分享，让你轻松自在

localize.description: 會所裏的分享應該是快速、簡單、方便的。這就是我們的優勢所在。選擇一個標籤。在你的房間裏分享它。放一個鏈接。提出一個問題。Dropit.
localize.tagline: 在會所裏分享，讓你輕鬆自在

next.excerpt: The project aims to provide tools to use during the development process. Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder texts, custom color dummy images, and videos of different sizes. Use generated content to test the layout until the real content arrives. Give it a try!
next.title: ipsm.io - Collection of productivity tools for developers & designers

localize.description: 该项目旨在提供开发过程中使用的工具。生成不同大小的Lorem Ipsum占位文本、自定义颜色的虚拟图像和视频。使用生成的内容来测试布局，直到真正的内容到达。试试吧
localize.tagline: 开发者和设计师的生产力工具集

localize.description: 該項目旨在提供開發過程中使用的工具。生成不同大小的Lorem Ipsum佔位文本、自定義顏色的虛擬圖像和視頻。使用生成的內容來測試佈局，直到真正的內容到達。試試吧
localize.tagline: 開發者和設計師的生產力工具集
